snippet: Relatives of 20-year-old Reynaldo Cuevas believe his death was not an accident, but was murder.
abstract: Family of 20-year-old Reynaldo Cuevas, bodega worker in the Bronx who was killed by a police bullet, requests that a grand jury investigate the actions of the officer who fired the fatal shot, calling it murder and not an accident; Bronx District Atty Robert T Johnson pledges to conduct an independent investigation into the shooting.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of 20-year-old Reynaldo Cuevas believe his death was not an accident, but was murder.

headline.seo: Family of Man Killed by Officer’s Bullet Wants Grand Jury to Investigate
headline.main: Family of Bodega Worker Killed by Officer’s Bullet Wants Grand Jury to Investigate
headline.print_headline: Family of Bodega Worker Killed by Officer’s Bullet Wants Grand Jury to Investigate
